Vlad suddenly became interested.

Vlad: Phoenix, tell me more about this attack.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Phoenix sighs and turns away, unsure of how to cheer him up.  Before 
> she gets any inspiration on that front, she thinks of something 
> else.  "Computer, what's happening with that attack force?"
> 
> "Scanning ... Predacon and Rogue forces have engaged Maximal 
> troops."  The computer brings up a holographic image of the battle, 
> which shows every indication of being a hellacious one.  Phoenix 
> shudders when she thinks of the welfare of those involved.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Vlad straightened back on the table again and closed his eyes.
> > 
> > Vlad: It matters not. No one here knows what I am talking about 
> when I 
> > speak of caste or even of honor! How low can you machines be so 
> that 
> > you do not even know about honor?!
> > 
> > He was tired and started to get depressed.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "My name's Phoenix," the femme exlpains, "and as far as caste is 
> > > concerned ... well, my function is as a healer.  Does that 
help?"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Vlad: Well, I suppose it is not your fault. What is your name, 
> and 
> > > > what caste do you belong to?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Phoenix shrugs.  "I'm new here, I don't know what the 
> Predacons 
> > > do 
> > > > > with their prisoners."
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Vlad looks at her with a disgusted stare.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Vlad: I assume I am a prisoner if I am in a cell, quiaff? 
> What 
> > > > for?
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > > > > OOC: Gah, stupid net connection ...
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Phoenix shies away even though she knows Vlad can't get 
> at 
> > > her 
> > > > > > > through the bars.  "Hey, cool down," she pleads.  
"You'll 
> > > just 
> > > > > get 
> > > > > > > yourself into trouble acting like that.  Anyway, I think 
> > > that's 
> > > > > how 
> > > > > > > Predacons operate as a rule."
